description: External alterations at 5th floor including changing external finish to an insulated render; new stair to roof; alterations to north elevation and addition of balustrade to roof. This application may affect the character and appearance of the conservation area.  Town and Country Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended); section 73.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 

Location Plan; Design & Access Statement dated September 2012; P032 RevA; P032 RevB; P033; P033 RevA; P042; P042 RevA; P043; P043 RevA; P041; P041 RevA; P044, P044 RevA; P047; P047 RevA; P048; P048 RevA. 

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
